title: why did my account get permanently suspended i did nothing
body: i have never cheated, hacked intentionally fed or anything i have  no clue why i got banned and i tried to check my emails but it was an old school email that i forgot please check over why my account got banned{{champion:35}}

replies.body:
You need to go contact [**Riot** support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as possible if you haven't already. Also I strongly advise you to change your email to a new one. If your account gets **hacked through your email**, it makes it very hard for **Riot** to help you.

GL!

Same today ? i didnt do anything 

{{summoner:4}}
